title: What contributes the most to a movie, going to the cinema, buying the DVD or buying it online? - Quora

response.answer_text: I finally found the answer. How Exactly Do Movies Make Money? Here’s a summary for you: The majority of studios’ benefits usually come from ticket sales (movie theaters/cinema).Some, such as Star Wars, earn a lot from derivative products.Others might rely mostly on TV channels to whom they sell the rights to broadcast their movie on a yearly basis.Finally, paying for streaming and DVDs also helps the studio.The bottom line : Every financial contribution is beneficial to the studio.The main source of benefits just depends on our choices (which seem to point at the movie theaters/cinema).Thank you Dina Zipin for your article, if you ever read this!
